messages.title: Getting Britain Working Again
messages.content: Labour have left the public finances of this country in a mess... Our plan is to get people off welfare and into work. We'll help small businesses...

messages.title: Backing the NHS
messages.content: We will increase spending every year... cut the deficit, not the NHS.

messages.title: Raising Standards in Schools
messages.content: We believe that discipline in schools is paramount... More powers for headteachers...

messages.title: Supporting Families
messages.content: We will recognise marriage in the tax system...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Our plan is to get people off welfare and into work. We'll help small businesses and encourage people to take up new skills.
We will increase spending every year on the NHS. Our goal is to cut the deficit and not the NHS.
We believe that discipline in schools is paramount to high educational standards. More powers for headteachers.
We will recognise marriage in the tax system and lift the earnings limit for married couples.

mentions.candidate: As your next MP, I will continue to fight for Poole and in the heart of the constituency Robert Syms' experience and campaigning record on local issues makes him the best candidate to represent you.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: 5 more years of Gordon Brown or change with the Conservatives

issues.economy: Labour have left the public finances of this country in a mess.
issues.education: We believe discipline in schools is paramount. More powers for headteachers.
issues.health: We will increase spending every year on the NHS.
issues.socialWelfare: Our plan is to get people off welfare and into work.

housing.content: RIGHT: A FAIR DEAL FOR TENANTS Robert Housing policy generates a great deal of debate. We feel like Tenants’ rights are very important affected by excessive taxes... Robert has campaigned against this.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will continue to fight for Poole. Changing the heart of the constituency Robert Syms' experience and campaigning record...

politicalExperience.achievements: Has addressed many meetings of residents, attended and taken up the cases of constituents who have difficulty with National or Local Government, part of the Health Committee.
